pronoun.description: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a female person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
examples: I told Hannah I would wait for her
peevishly she flung her on her face

possessive determiner.description: Belonging to or associated with a female person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
examples: how the mother crane treats her babies

origin: Old English hire, genitive and dative of hīo, hēo she.
